messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Next Step Unschool Conference
messages.msgSnippet: -=-Only ONE more week to get HALF OFF registration for Atlanta s only Unschool Conference! Visit www.nextstep2014.com for more information and to register
messages.messageBody:
-=-Only ONE more week to get HALF OFF registration for Atlanta's only Unschool Conference! Visit www.nextstep2014.com for more information and to register TODAY!-=-

Is there a page or discussion list people can subscribe to for future notifications? I would rather not have this discussion filled up with conference notifications.

To others who might be interested in this conference in Atlanta, please find a way to get information directly.

Thanks!

Sandra

P.S. Conferences involving moderators and very-regular writers here are different and might be mentioned more often, but still not much.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
